original_text: And all the souls that came out of the loins of Jacob were seventy souls: for Joseph was in Egypt already.
korean_text: 야곱의 허리에서 나온 사람이 모두 칠십이요 요셉은 애굽에 있었더라

sentences.original_text: And all the souls that came out of the loins of Jacob
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 야곱의 허리에서 나온 모든 영혼들은

sentences.original_text: for Joseph was in Egypt already.
